title: Tranquil Riverside Lodge Retreat Just Two Hours from Newcastle
description:
Leave the hustle and bustle behind and linger a little longer in serenity at the top-rated Harrington River Lodge - ranked Harrington's #1 BnB on Tripadvisor - a laidback escape overlooking the Manning River that feels refreshingly remote and yet effortlessly accessible less than two hours from Newcastle.

Sitting on three kilometres of charming riverbank promenade on the edge of Crowdy Bay National Park with a nine-hole championship golf course and the beach’s champagne shores less than 10 minutes away, this tranquil lodge couldn’t be in a more relaxing location. Take a lazy boat trip down the river, follow one of the nearby hiking trails, discover nearby Port Macquarie and return to this riverside retreat for a plunge in the lodge’s alluring swimming pool.

title: Relaxing Riverfront Escape Just Two Hours from Newcastle
description: Perched on the charming Manning River, you’ll find a romantic escape on New South Wales’ stunning coastline. Relax and recharge on a long weekend at Harrington River Lodge where you can launch your boat, tee up on the nine-hole golf course or simply do nothing at all. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a cured meat platter to share with a glass of wine each, welcome bottle of wine on arrival and guaranteed late 12pm checkout.
